titles.title: If My People Who Bear My Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If my people who bear My Name
Will humble themselves and pray
If they seek My Presence
and turn their backs on their wicked ways

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then I will hear
from heaven I'll hear
from heaven and will forgive
I will forgive
their sins and will heal
their land, yes, I will heal
their land
